name: Yelp Business and Reviews
special_instructions: One of search terms or direct URLs must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
The tool can return up to 240 results on average, but this may vary depending on various factors
The cost of scraping can be estimated by running a test scrape
The output of the tool is a JSON object with the business name, address, phone number, rating, and review text
If the tool doesn't meet your needs, you can build your own scraper using Apify's templates or open-source library
For any technical feedback or bugs, create an issue on the Actor’s Issues tab in Apify Console
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any privacy or any other limit
